thread.title: Orlando theme park and attractions discounts, prices and hours
thread.title_full: Orlando theme park and attractions discounts, prices and hours

title: Orlando theme park and attractions discounts, prices and hours
text:
0 
KENNEDY SPACE CENTER VISITOR COMPLEX: featuring Space Shuttle Atlantis, Apollo/Saturn V Center with Saturn V moon rocket, Angry Birds Space Encounter, Shuttle Launch Experience: open at 9 a.m.-6 p.m. daily; east of U.S. Highway 1 on NASA Parkway, 5 miles south of Titusville; $50 plus tax adults, $40 plus tax ages 3-11; 877-313-2610; KennedySpaceCenter.com. 
ORLANDO SCIENCE CENTER: interactive exhibits, Crosby Observatory, giant screen movies, planetarium, permanent exhibits, "Mummies of the World". 10 a.m.-5 p.m. Thursday-Tuesday (closed Wednesdays); 777 E. Princeton St., Orlando; $19 adults, $13 ages 3-11 ($5 parking); 407-514-2000; osc.org. 
SKELETONS: ANIMALS REVEALED: . over 450 animal skeletons and educational elements. 10 a.m.-10 p.m. daily; inside I-Drive 360, 8441 International Drive, Orlando; $19.99 adults, $12.99 ages 3-11; 407-203-6999; skeletonmuseum.com. 
U.S. SPACE WALK OF FAME MUSEUM: space-exploration history organized by former Kennedy Space Center workers: 10 a.m.-5 p.m. Monday-Saturday; 308 Pine St., Titusville; $5 adult, free age 16 and under; 321-264-0434. 
Theme parks 
ANIMAL KINGDOM: 500-acre home to more than 1,000 animals plus shows and rides: 9 a.m.-7 p.m. today-Saturday and Tuesday-Thursday, 9 a.m.-6 p.m. Sunday-Monday; Disney World, off Interstate 4 southwest of Orlando; parking $17, one-day pass $97 plus tax general, $91 plus tax ages 3-9, free age 2 and younger; 407-824-4321 or disneyworld.com. 
BUSCH GARDENS: African-themed park and zoo, Sheikra roller coaster, Sesame Street Safari of Fun and other attractions, Food & Wine Festival (through Sunday): 9:30 a.m.-midnight today-Saturday, 9:30 a.m.-9 p.m. Sunday-Thursday; 8 miles northeast of downtown Tampa at 40th Street and Busch Boulevard; $95 adult, $90 ages 3-9, free age 2 and younger; 813-987-5082. 
DISCOVERY COVE: interplay with dolphins, exotic birds, fish, stingrays: 8 a.m.-5:30 p.m. daily; adjacent to SeaWorld Orlando, off BeachLine Expressway at Interstate 4 southwest of Orlando; $219 and up plus tax with dolphin interaction; $149 and up plus tax day resort package, must be 6 and older to participate in dolphin swim (includes lunch, swim gear and 14-day pass to SeaWorld Orlando, Aquatica, or Busch Gardens), "Trainer for a Day" packages starting at $398 plus tax; 877-434-7268; discoverycove.com. 
DISNEY'S HOLLYWOOD STUDIOS: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Legend of Captain Jack Sparrow, Twilight Zone Tower of Terror, and Fantasmic! light show; Frozen Fireworks Spectacular (today): 9 a.m.-10 p.m. daily; off Interstate 4 southwest of Orlando; parking $17, one-day pass $97 plus tax general, $91 plus tax ages 3-9, free age 2 and younger; 407-824-4321 or disneyworld.com. 
EPCOT: showcase of technology and foreign cultures, with Illuminations fireworks nightly: Future World: 9 a.m.-9 p.m. daily; World Showcase: 11 a.m.-9 p.m. daily; off Interstate 4 southwest of Orlando; parking $17, one-day pass $97 plus tax general, $91 plus tax ages 3-9, free age 2 and younger; 407-824-4321 or disneyworld.com. 
THE HOLY LAND EXPERIENCE: "living biblical museum" including musical dramas, presentations, indoor model of Jerusalem and crucifixion re-enactments daily: 10 a.m.-6 p.m. Tuesday-Saturday; 4655 Vineland Road, Orlando; $50 adults, $35 ages 6-12, $20 ages 3-5; 407-367-2065; holylandexperience.com. 
ISLANDS OF ADVENTURE: themed areas including the Wizarding World of Harry Potter, Marvel Super Hero Island and more: 8 a.m.-10 p.m. daily; at Universal Orlando, Interstate 4 and Kirkman Road, Orlando; one-day admission $102 adults, $97 ages 3-9, free age 2 and younger ($17 parking, free for Florida residents after 6 p.m); 407-363-8000; http://www.universalorlando.com. 
LEGOLAND: with coasters, rides, Miniland USA and water park, "The World of Chima" attraction: 10 a.m.-9 p.m. today-Sunday, 10 a.m.-7 p.m. Monday-Thursday; water park 10:30 a.m.-6 p.m. daily; 1 Legoland Way, Winter Haven; $84 plus tax adults, $77 plus tax ages 3-12 or ages 60 and older; 877-350-5346; legoland.com. 
SEAWORLD ORLANDO: marine and adventure park with "One Ocean" show, Journey to Atlantis and Manta rides, TurtleTrek, Viva la Musica Saturday: 9 a.m.-11 p.m. today-Saturday, 9 a.m.-9 p.m. Sunday-Thursday; off BeachLine Expressway at Interstate 4 southwest of Orlando; parking $17, one-day admission $97 adult, $92 ages 3-9; 407-351-3600; seaworldparks.com. 
UNIVERSAL STUDIOS: movie-TV park with The Simpsons Ride, Revenge of the Mummy, Transformers and others: 8 a.m.-10 p.m. daily; Interstate 4 and Kirkman Road, Orlando; one-day admission $102 adults, $97 ages 3-9, free age 2 and younger ($17 parking, free for Florida residents after 6 p.m.); 407-363-8000; http://www.universalorlando.com. 
WALT DISNEY WORLD MAGIC KINGDOM: Main Street USA, Liberty Square, Adventureland, Frontierland, Fantasyland, Tomorrowland, with the Festival of Fantasy Parade, Main Street Electrical Parade, and Wishes Fireworks display daily. Park Hours: 9 a.m.-midnight daily; off Interstate 4 southwest of Orlando; parking $17, one-day pass $105 plus tax adults, $99 plus tax ages 3-9, free age 2 and younger; 407-824-4321; disneyworld.com. 
Water activities 
ADVENTURE ISLAND: water park located next to Busch Gardens: 9 a.m.-9 p.m. today-Saturday and Thursday, 9 a.m.-7 p.m. Sunday-Wednesday; off BeachLine Expressway at Interstate 4 southwest of Orlando; $13 parking, $56 adults, $51 ages 3-9; adventureisland.com.
